# echosBullets

**Instance Property**

A Boolean that indicates whether the receiver echoes a bullet character rather than each character typed.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var echosBullets: Bool { get set }
```

## Discussion

Default is [doc://com.apple.documentation/documentation/Swift/true].
